amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the implementation by the Department of Veterans Affairs of section 101 of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 in rural areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2787 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2787 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7878-7881; text: CR S7880) To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the implementation by the Department of Veterans Affairs of section 101 of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 in rural areas.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2787 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2763.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2787 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
